column1: Local Foods////I've been here multiple times and always get the Garden Veggies Sandwich
column2: but this time I tried the Salad. The salad was a salad... the green dressing was a bit sour yet tasty. There was fruits: dragon fruit
column3: strawberries and greens included in the salad. Although it was overpriced
column4: I still got it. I would say it was okay and definitely think the sandwiches are more worth the price .
